title: David James and Nadiya Bychkova hold hands and hug at Pride Of Britain

Strictly's David James and his former dance partner Nadiya Bychkova have been spotted holding hands as they put on a cosy display at Pride of Britain.

Tonight's display comes as they shared a steamy kiss last week following filming for It Takes Two.

David and Nadiya were inseparable, and were hugging and smiling on the red carpet.

The pair were caught holding hands on a video as they went down for dinner, as they carried on with the steamy display.

They quickly let go of hands as they entered the crowd of celebrities at the star-studded event.

And with all eyes on Nadiya's incredibly revealing dress, it's no surprise that he's been spotted by her side all night.

(Image: David Dyson/Daily Mirror)

(Image: David Fisher/REX)

She wore a scantily-clad tight velvet dress with mesh panelling, showing off every inch of skin in a racy display, mostly covering up just her top half, before it tailed out at the end into a fishtail.

(Image: David Fisher/REX)

(Image: PA)

An eye-witness said: "David and Nadiya looked very cosy inside the awards. They held each other's hands away from the cameras, and kept smiling at each other.

"They wouldn't even let go to walk down the stairs into the dinner room. Perhaps she needed his support while wearing that black dress, but David looked more than happy to be so close to her."
description: EXCLUSIVE: Former Strictly star David James cuddles up to ex dance partner Nadiya Bychkova as they hold hands at Pride of Britain
